mapper.insert: insert into book values(default, #{studentCode}, #{bookName}, #{bookStyle, typeHandler = cc.yyf.book.typeHandler.MyTypeHandler}, #{bookIntroduction}, #{bookSrc}, #{bookDate}, #{price}, #{stock});
mapper.update: update book set stock = stock - #{num} where bookId = #{bookId};
update book set stock = stock + #{num} where bookId = #{bookId};
mapper.select: select stock from book where bookId = #{bookId};
select orderId from userOrder where orderStatus = #{status, typeHandler = cc.yyf.book.typeHandler.OrderEnumTypeHandler} and orderEndTime < #{time};
mapper.update: update userOrder set orderStatus = #{newStatus, typeHandler = cc.yyf.book.typeHandler.OrderEnumTypeHandler} where orderStatus = #{oldStatus, typeHandler = cc.yyf.book.typeHandler.OrderEnumTypeHandler} and orderEndTime < #{time};
